msContents.summary: Tax register, recording the daily collection of money taxes in the village of Karanis; the name of each tax-payer paying the poll-tax is cross-referenced with a page of another register, where taxpayers were listed geographically

msItemStruct.note: Due to the size of this tax roll (P.Mich. IV/1, 225 + IV/2, 358), its content has been divided in the present database into several cards (one for each column).
Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank

div.ab: (Col.) 137;;(Epeiph 4th, continued);Ptolemaios, son of Orsenouphis and Anthia, grandson of Herieus, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;Tasoucharin, daughter of Damas - (through) the fuller - for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 1 drachme 2 obols; for olive (transportation), 1 obol 2 chalkoi; for naubion, 1 obol; for supplements, 2 obols 2 chalkoi; for eparourion, 5 1/2 obols; for supplements, 1/2 obol; for kollybos, 1/2 obol. Total: 3 drachmai 1 obol.;And on account of Damas, son of Petheus, for the naubion of the catoeci, for year 14: 2 1/2 obols 2 chalkoi; for supplements, 1/2 obol; for kollybos, 2 chalkoi. Total: 31/2 obols. (In left margin:) 4 drachmai 4 obols.;Total for the day: 72 drachmai 28 obols.;;On the 5th, similarly:;Maron, son of Petheus the younger and Apollonous, grandson of Anchorimphis, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;Ptollis, son of Akousilaos and Aphrodous, grandson of Ptollis, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;Kastor, slave of Aphrodous: 4 drachmai;Petheus, son of Nestosiris and Thermouthis, grandson of Petheus, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;Valerius, of unknown father, his mother being Valeria, for ch(--): 4 drachmai;Thermouthis, daughter of Papeis - (through) the son of Papeis the blind - for garden land of year 13: for apomoira, 1 drachme 2 obols; for olive (transportation), 1 obol 2 chalkoi; for naubion, 1 obol; for supplements, 2 obols [[2 chalkoi]]; for eparourion, 1 drachme 4 1/2 obols; for supplements, 1 obol; for kollybos, 1/2 obol. Total: 4 drachmai 2 chalkoi. (In left margin:) 4 drachmai 4 obols.;Total for the day: 24 drachmai 4 obols.
